IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: A COLLEGE PREPARATORY SCHOOL AFFILIATED WITH THE EPISCOPAL CHURCH.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PREPARE YOUNG MEN AND WOMEN FOR ACADEMIC SUCCESS IN COLLEGE, AND TO CHALLENGE AND INSPIRE THEM TO BE LEADERS FOR GOOD IN THE WORLD. WE SEEK TO DO THIS WITHIN A SMALL AND FAMILIAL RESIDENTIAL COMMUNITY WHICH VALUES THE MORAL AND SPIRITUAL DEVELOPMENT OF OUR STUDENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. THE ORGANIZATION COMPLIES WITH ASC 740-10 (FORMERLY FIN 48), WHICH ESTABLISHES A THRESHOLD FOR DETERMINING WHEN AN INCOME TAX BENEFIT OF A TAX POSITION CAN BE RECOGNIZED. UNDER ASC 740-10, A TAX POSITION INCLUDES, AMONG OTHER THINGS, (A) A DECISION NOT TO FILE A TAX RETURN (B) AN ALLOCATION OR A SHIFT OF INCOME BETWEEN JURISDICTIONS (C) THE CHARACTERIZATION OF INCOME OR A DECISION TO EXCLUDE REPORTING TAXABLE INCOME IN A TAX RETURN (D) A DECISION TO CLASSIFY A TRANSACTION, ENTITY, OR OTHER POSITION IN A TAX RETURN AS TAX EXEMPT AND (E) AN ENTITY'S STATUS, INCLUDING ITS STATUS AS A TAX-EXEMPT NOT-FOR-PROFIT ENTITY. BASED ON ITS INTERPRETATION OF THE REQUIREMENTS OF ASC 740-10, MANAGEMENT BELIEVES THAT THE ORGANIZATION HAS NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT QUALIFY FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE. ACCORDINGLY, COMPLIANCE WITH THIS STANDARD HAD NO MATERIAL EFFECT ON THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
NONDISCRIMINATORY AD PLACED IN THE NEWSPAPER "THE BALTIMORE SUN AND THE "WASHINGTON POST"

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, SCHEDULE I, PAGE 2, PART III(A), LINES 1 AND 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FINANCIAL AID AND AWARDS ARE PAID DIRECTLY TO THE EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION AND NOT TO THE INDIVIDUALS, ENSURING THAT THE AMOUNTS ARE UTILIZED IN THE MANNER INTENDED.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: TO BE USED FOR PROJECT COSTS, BANK FEES AND COST OF ISSUANCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE TAX RETURN IS PREPARED BY THE ORGANIZATION'S ACCOUNTING FIRM. A COPY OF THE TAX RETURN IS PROVIDED TO THE BUSINESS MANAGER FOR REVIEW BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH RESPONSIBLE PERSON ANNUALLY COMPLETES A DISCLOSURE FORM IDENTIFYING ANY RELATIONSHIPS, POSITIONS OR CIRCUMSTANCES IN WHICH THE RESPONSIBLE PERSON IS INVOLVED THAT HE OR SHE BELIEVES COULD CONTRIBUTE TO A CONFLICT OF INTEREST ARISING. THIS INFORMATION IS TREATED AS CONFIDENTIAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION UPON REQUEST.
THE ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS OF OBTAINING AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM PRIOR YEAR.
